short_summary: Training in Advanced Digital Forensics Techniques
description: This requirement is for a contractor to provide Advanced Digital Forensics Techniques training for DND/CAF members in order to prepare to take the General Certificate in Forensics Analysis (GCFA) in Digital Forensics exam. Estimated quantity of commodity: $70,000.00 Duration of contract: Contract Award to 2023-03-31 Option to Extend the Contract to 2026-03-31 Time frame of delivery: Contract Award to 2023-03-31
full_summary:
### Training in Advanced Digital Forensics Techniques
#### Request for Proposal (RFP) # W6369-23-P5OR/A

**Issue Date:** 2022-11-29
**Closing Date:** 2023-01-09 T 13:00:00 EST
**Classification:** Service-type Contract (SRV)

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for a Training in Advanced Digital Forensics Techniques contract. This requirement is for a contractor to provide advanced digital forensics training for DND/CAF members with the purpose of preparing them to take the General Certificate in Forensics Analysis (GCFA) in Digital Forensics examination.

**Scope of Work:**
The successful contractor will be responsible for delivering a comprehensive Advanced Digital Forensics Techniques training program for DND/CAF members. The estimated value of the contract is $70,000. The training program should be completed within 31 days of contract award, with an option to extend the contract up to March 31, 2026.

**Deliverables:**
The contractor must provide the following deliverables:
- Comprehensive Advanced Digital Forensics Techniques training program for DND/CAF members
- Preparation of DND/CAF members for the GCFA in Digital Forensics examination
- Training program reports and feedback to the contracting authority

**Contact Information:**
For further information, please contact Mr. Burke, the contracting officer at:
Mark Burke
mark.burke@forces.gc.ca
(613) 447-9379

**Document Exchange:**
The Request for Proposal (RFP) documents are available for download at [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca).

**Attachment:**
The RFP documents can be downloaded in English [en]([https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/29/18019edb38a1fdcd266f84c00be40516/w6369-23p5or_rfp_en_pdf.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/29/18019edb38a1fdcd266f84c00be40516/w6369-23p5or_rfp_en_pdf.pdf)) and French [fr]([https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/29/a4030b5b8d2
